Nerf Cyberhoop is a connected toy and mobile game for iOS.

My role: Game Designer and Lead producer

Nerf Cyberhoop was a product developed for Hasbro consisting of a physical Nerf Hoop toy, audio detection scheme and accessory iOS app. When the player scores a basket, the hoop emits a high frequency tone that is detected by the iOS app, which provides real-time commentary and video capture, to produce highlights of your best shots and slams.

I served as game designer and lead producer, managing our programming and art teams. The game was released through the Apple app store for iOS devices.
